channel.title: Mini game help
channel.description: HELP!how do i make the chest gives u an item and deletes the item that u use to open it i added the chest and i added the chest thing that gives u an item but it wont give any item when i use the item on the chest

item.title: Mini game help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:2, topic:226986”][quote author=recker450 link=topic=298295.msg2396329#msg2396329 date=1219175112]
HELP!how do i make the chest gives u an item and deletes the item that u use to open it i added the chest and i added the chest thing that gives u an item but it wont give any item when i use the item on the chest
[/quote]

Have you even added the method into packet 53?[/quote]
Can you stop making sarcastic sly comments?
Recker, you need to make a new object case to make it do something, I’m not sure if this is what you’re after as you didn’t word your question right, but oh well.
Here is the layout for a object case:

case ####: //#### = object id addItem(itemId, Amount); sendMessage("ohai thar i r a chest pls"); break;
Kay?

Read full topic

item.title: Mini game help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

If you dident make a case for it, basically your server wont recognize why its being opened, if it even knows its there. :s

Read full topic
